snippet.title: Project Onyx - First Game With Gen 1 Bots
snippet.description: Before you spam the comments saying that I suck, I was playing with a controller to make it more fair, and make the gameplay more smooth. Controller input is not yet finished. I've started to make AI for multiplayer, in case you don't have internet, or just want to spice your games up. These are the most basic ai you can have. They will get more and more intelligent as I add more functionality to them. Hope you guys are as exited as I am for this game!
